node.title: Can An Ecommerce Site Be Static?
node.description: Getting an e-commerce website up and running traditionally required a monolithic e-commerce framework, but there are other options available.

node.title: Why Choose A JAMStack Website?
node.subhead: What are the benefits of a static website
node.description: We look at how JAMStack websites differ from more traditional CMS based technologies like Drupal, Joomla and WordPress Websites
